entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 40%

High 9. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 10 April 2023
